metadata.title: CVE-2011-2808 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A stale layout root is set as an input element in WebKit in Google Chromebefore Blink M13 when a child of a keygen with autofocus is accessed.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
